original_title: Living The Dream: The New Young Millionaires
overview: Heirs to huge fortunes of tens, even hundreds of millions of pounds, these mega-rich twentysomethings are part of the planetâ€™s wealthiest 1%. This small circle of privileged young people flaunt their lavish lifestyles on social media, reality TV, and in magazines. A golden youth who embrace their wealth, and are not afraid of causing controversy, we follow their extraordinary daily lives.
title: Living The Dream: The New Young Millionaires
